Articles.Content:
hello everyone its been a long time :3

 

im here to request some mods i hope you can help

 

please mods 1.1.3 only

1. Clouds , Dust Storms , eve clouds , Laythe clouds and bright blue etc. but i hope you give me a mod that wont lag my PC

i used ( scatter , SVE  , KSPRC and Astronmer but it all lagged )

 

2. HD Planets i want that mod that make planets quality little better (  i dont want SVT because it require SVE which lags my PC )

 

3. Jool Rings ( and with few asteroids around it if possible )

 

4. Auroras
If those mods lag your computer, all of them will.
